note:
Not just new to Mastodon, but new to this type of social media paradigm. I had an account at twitter. I think I posted something to it once ten or fifteen years ago. Feeling like I need to make some connections, so here I am!

Living just outside of Asheville, NC, my wife and our two dogs live full time in an RV. We have been living this way for 4 years.

Student of Zen Buddhism. IT consultant.

Also a musician of sorts. I make noise. I call it music, but many other wouldn't. I'm ok with that.
